Field.Description: The term set id for the header links
Field.Name: HeaderLinksTermSetId

Field.Description: The term set id for the footer links
Field.Name: FooterLinksTermSetId
HideSideBar
Field.Description: If checked, hide the side bar and the breadcrumb for this specific page

Field.Name: ForceCacheRefresh
Field.Description: If set to "Yes", forces the refresh of users browser cache to get the last version of the navigation menus. If set to "No", the navigation nodes will be cached in the browser, improving performances. Set "Yes" if you have made updates to the navigation structure.

Field.Name: IntranetIsNewsOnTop
Field.Description: If set to 'Yes', this news will be prioritized to appear on the top of the list in the home page news list and in the search results.

pnp:ContentType.Name: Default Page
pnp:ContentType.Description: Page is a system content type template created by the Publishing Resources feature. The column templates from Page will be added to all Pages libraries created by the Publishing feature.

pnp:ContentType.Name: Static Page
pnp:ContentType.Description: Page is a system content type template created by the Publishing Resources feature. The column templates from Page will be added to all Pages libraries created by the Publishing feature.

pnp:ContentType.Name: News Page
pnp:ContentType.Description: Page is a system content type template created by the Publishing Resources feature. The column templates from Page will be added to all Pages libraries created by the Publishing feature.

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Documents
pnp:ListInstance.Description: This system library was created by the Publishing feature to store documents that are used on pages in this site.

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Pages
pnp:ListInstance.Description: This system library was created by the Publishing feature to store pages that are created in this site.

properties.property: Allows authors to insert HTML snippets or scripts.

Content Search Web Part will allow you to show items that are results of a search query you specify. When you add it to the page, this Web Part will show recently modified items from the current site. You can change this setting to show items from another site or list by editing the Web Part and changing its search criteria.As new content is discovered by search, this Web Part will display an updated list of items each time the page is viewed.
